text: ...its probably my young and naive mind but how is he guilty when he literally didnt break any rules and did it all legally within the constitution-

answers.text: @lgbtpokemon He did break many laws. Impeachment is not a criminal trial. It is a political remedy for political malfeasance. Even if he is acquitted, which in all likelihood he will be because Republicans in the Senate are spineless, he will still be subject to criminal prosecution.
